        public static void init()
        Initiates the EventBus - this is for internal use and should NOT be used by anyone else

      • register

        public static void register(Events eventType,
                            java.lang.Object function)
        Registers an event handler for a specific event
        Parameters:
        eventType - The type of event to listen for
        function - The Javascript function to handle the event - must take the event as an argument

      • notifyListeners

        public static void notifyListeners(Events eventType,
                                   java.lang.Object event)
        Notifies all event listeners of a specific event - this is for internal use and should NOT be used by anyone else
        Parameters:
        eventType - The type of event
        event - The event
